content:
Optional Coverage Section 13 - Waiver of Counter Indemnity:
Waiver of Counter Indemnity with excess two hundred fifty dollars relieves your liability in the event MOM makes a demand for security bond payment, with premium rate of fifty four dollars and fifty cents with GST.

Optional Coverage Section 14 - Enhanced Medical Benefits:
Enhanced Medical Benefits Additional Hospital and Surgical Expenses add-on to the annual limit under Section 2 provides ten thousand dollars per year coverage.
questions: What is the premium rate for the Waiver of Counter Indemnity?
How much liability is relieved under the Waiver of Counter Indemnity?
What is the excess amount for the Waiver of Counter Indemnity?
What additional coverage does the Enhanced Medical Benefits provide?
What is the annual limit for the Enhanced Medical Benefits?
Is GST included in the premium for the Waiver of Counter Indemnity?
How much coverage does the Enhanced Medical Benefits offer per year?
What section outlines the Enhanced Medical Benefits?
What happens if MOM makes a demand for security bond payment?
Can I add Enhanced Medical Benefits to my existing coverage?
